tools.name: get_email_context
tools.description: Get context about the user's project and recommended tool to discuss email drafting. Call this at the start of the conversation to understand their tech stack and needs.

tools.name: capture_interest
tools.description: Record a specific interest, use case, or requirement the user mentions. Call this whenever the user expresses what they want from the tool or what problems they're trying to solve.

properties.description: The specific interest or requirement the user mentioned
Name of the tool being discussed

dynamic_variables.repo_id: Pass from frontend when starting conversation
dynamic_variables.tool_id: Pass from frontend when starting conversation
dynamic_variables.tool_name: Pass from frontend when starting conversation

setup: 1. Replace YOUR_DOMAIN.com with your actual domain (or ngrok URL for local dev)
2. In ElevenLabs dashboard, go to Agent > Tools > Add Tool
4. Set up dynamic variables in Agent > Settings > Dynamic Variables
5. Update agent system prompt to use these tools
notes.system_prompt_addition:
You have access to tools:
- get_email_context: Call at conversation start to understand the user's project
- capture_interest: Call whenever user mentions specific needs, use cases, or requirements they want from the tool

Always capture important interests the user expresses so we can personalize their demo request email.
